variants.Description in input context: The A53T mutation in SNCA is associated with familial Parkinson's disease.

Material used.Description: The experiment used SH-SY5Y cells expressing wild-type or mutant SNCA.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing the A53T variant showed 30% reduced viability compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA-expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.
